name: chemically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or is caused by chemicals: The fund provides money to clean up chemically polluted industrial sites. Stomach acid breaks down food, chemically altering it so that the body can extract the required nutrients. See
chemical
More examplesFewer examplesThe urine samples were frozen until chemically analyzed.The new technique chemically changes the gene which causes the illness. Chemically, oils and fats are the same, differing only in melting point.
